lead_paragraph: The initial lure of South by Southwest in 1987 was site-specific and ephemeral; now this music festival generates content for people who don’t have to be there.

headline.print_headline: Turned Inside Out, Only to Expand
headline.main: SXSW: From Exclusive Performances to Cellphone Souvenirs

snippet: The initial lure of South by Southwest in 1987 was site-specific and ephemeral; now this music festival generates content for people who don’t have to be there.
abstract: Jon Pareles Critic's Notebook observes how technology has induced South by Southwest music festival to evolve over 30 years from regional event focused on ephemeral live performance to industry mainstay with global reach.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
